name: Carbonext
description: At Carbonext Inc., we are developing a circularity strategy that retrofits existing architectures to produce industrial grade graphene in a cost-effective, scalable and environmentally friendly manner. Our technology addresses the pains of graphite users
one_liner: At Carbonext Inc., we are developing a circularity strategy that retrofits existing architectures to produce industrial grade graphene in a cost-effective, scalable and environmentally friendly manner. Our technology addresses the pains of graphite users
